articles.title: European Super League: Clubs must be honest about breakaway league - Richard Masters - BBC News
articles.description: Premier League chief executive Richard Masters says he needs the "truth" from the 'big six' clubs who were planning to join the European Super League.
articles.content:
Manchester United fans protested on the pitch at Old Trafford against the Glazer family, who took over the club in 2005

articles.title: Colonial Pipeline paid hackers nearly US$5M in ransom - BNN
articles.description: Colonial Pipeline Co. paid nearly US$5 million to Eastern European hackers on Friday, contradicting reports earlier this week that the company had no intention of paying an extortion fee to help restore the country’s largest fuel pipeline, according to two pe…
